name: Don't Maul the Town
description:
You love the little town you live in and everyone there. Unfortunately, you are a werewolf, and you transform every night into a coldblooded beast.

Save the town from yourself by buying and placing structures to trap yourself during the day, so that when night-time comes, you can't hurt the townspeople. Get money from the bank, buy some walls and fences, and try to keep the town alive for as long as possible!

DAYTIME CONTROLS:

W/A/S/D - Move character

1/2/3/4/5/6/7 - Select item

Left click - Place item/Select shop items

Right click - Remove item/Interact with NPC

Spacebar - Speed up time

NIGHTTIME CONTROLS:

None

This game is a prototype. The mechanics are jank, and the quality is dank.
